features: Stay warm in temperatures as low as 30°F/-1C
Coletherm™ Max premium and lightweight fill ​provides better heat retention with less weight and allows bag to pack easily into stuff sack
Compressible stuff sack with side straps that can be cinched to compress the bag; compact size packs up smaller than traditional Coleman® sleeping bags (9.4 x 9 x 15.7 in.)
Thermolock™​ draft tube prevents heat loss through the zipper
ZipPlow™​ patented zipper for snag-free opening and closing
Comfort Cuff™​ patented design provides soft protection and comfort around fac
Roll Control™​ patented design keeps your bag straight while rolling it up
Quick Cord​™​ easy tying system secures bag once rolled
Dimensions: 75 x 33 in., fits campers up to 5 ft. 11 in..
